Ambassador of Oren: My master is the ruler of Oren Castle, renowned throughout the world for his wisdom and strength. To you who have gained possession of this fortress, he sends these words: "Prove your loyalty to the castle with this contract!" Unless you do so, my lord will know that your loyalty is suspect. Make your decision!
[npc_%objectId%_yes|"Very well, I will sign the contract."] [npc_%objectId%_no|"I need no help from people like you!"]
